q: Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer wants you to know that the Xbox 360`` isn't a gaming console.'' Rather, Steve Ballmer believes the 360- along with Kinect- acts as a complete family entertainment center. It's a place to socialize. It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller.
